title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Words can sometimes get in the way of what the heart desires. Perhaps there are more emotions and thoughts swarming than you have the time or energy to organize. Dont push yourself too hard if youre not connecting to loved ones as you wish. Sometimes, expectations can stand between you and happiness. You dont need to speak much today. Just be present, when theres nothing to show or tell. A Spanish proverb states, Open your mouth only if what you are going to say is more beautiful than the silence. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
